Squats Training.name: Standard Squat
Squats Training.description: Perform a basic squat while keeping your feet shoulder-width apart.

Squats Training.name: Wide Stance Squat
Squats Training.description: Perform a squat with feet wider than shoulder-width for more inner thigh activation.

Squats Training.name: Close Stance Squat
Squats Training.description: Keep feet close together to emphasize quads more.

Squats Training.name: Sumo Squat
Squats Training.description: Take a wide stance with toes pointing outward, lowering into a squat.

Squats Training.name: Pistol Squat
Squats Training.description: Perform a one-legged squat while extending the other leg forward.

Squats Training.name: Jump Squats
Squats Training.description: Explosively jump at the top of the squat for power development.

Squats Training.name: Pause Squat
Squats Training.description: Hold the bottom position of a squat for a few seconds before rising.

Squats Training.name: Wall Squat (Wall Sit)
Squats Training.description: Hold a squat position with your back against a wall.

Squats Training.name: Deep Squat Hold
Squats Training.description: Sit in a deep squat position for an extended period to improve mobility.

Squats Training.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
Squats Training.description: Place one foot on an elevated surface behind you and squat on one leg.

Squats Training.name: Shrimp Squat
Squats Training.description: Hold one foot behind you and lower into a controlled single-leg squat.

Squats Training.name: Curtsy Squat
Squats Training.description: Step one leg behind the other in a curtsy motion while lowering into a squat.

Squats Training.name: Hindu Squat
Squats Training.description: Perform a deep squat with heels lifting slightly off the ground.

Squats Training.name: Cossack Squat
Squats Training.description: Shift your weight side to side into a deep lateral squat.

Squats Training.name: Single-Leg Box Squat
Squats Training.description: Lower onto a box using one leg, then stand back up.

Squats Training.name: Kang Squat
Squats Training.description: Hinge at the hips before dropping into a squat, mimicking a good morning movement.

Squats Training.name: Sissy Squat
Squats Training.description: Lean back and lower your knees forward while engaging your quads.

Squats Training.name: Isometric Squat Hold
Squats Training.description: Hold the squat position for an extended period to build endurance.

Squats Training.name: Step-Through Squats
Squats Training.description: Perform a squat, step forward, and repeat in a continuous motion.

Squats Training.name: Bear Squats
Squats Training.description: Start in a bear crawl position, lowering and pushing hips back like a squat.

Squats Training.name: Elevated Heel Squats
Squats Training.description: Perform squats with heels slightly elevated to target the quads more.

Squats Training.name: Speed Squats
Squats Training.description: Perform fast-paced squats to improve endurance and explosiveness.

Squats Training.name: Explosive Skater Squats
Squats Training.description: Lower into a skater squat and explode upwards.

Squats Training.name: Leg Swings
Squats Training.description: Swing one leg forward and backward to loosen up the hip flexors.

Squats Training.name: Hip Circles
Squats Training.description: Stand and move your hips in circular motions to increase mobility.

Squats Training.name: Butt Kicks
Squats Training.description: Run in place while kicking your heels toward your glutes.

Squats Training.name: Lateral Leg Swings
Squats Training.description: Swing one leg side to side to loosen up the hip joints.

Squats Training.name: Ankle Rolls
Squats Training.description: Rotate your ankles in circles to improve stability before squatting.
